channel.title: Surfing on Wavelets
channel.description: Recent content on Surfing on Wavelets

item.description:
Welcome here fellow wavelet surfer!

What is this blog about?

This blog is mostly about applied and computational mathematics, with a specific focus on harmonic analysis and its applications for signal processing.

I will present topics which I’m willing to explore, learn and share. Because sharing and presenting knowledge in a clear way is just as fun as learning.
